Name: Maputo
Description: The capital region, located in the southern part of the country, known for its coastal beauty and urban development.

Name: Gaza
Description: A southern province known for its agricultural activities and the Limpopo River.

Name: Inhambane
Description: A coastal province with beautiful beaches, known for tourism and agriculture.

Name: Sofala
Description: Located on the central coast, known for its diverse ecosystems, agriculture, and fishing.

Name: Manica
Description: A province known for its mountains, agriculture, and proximity to Zimbabwe.

Name: Tete
Description: A province known for its coal resources and located along the Zambezi River.

Name: Zambezia
Description: A coastal province with rich agricultural land and the Zambezi River running through it.

Name: Nampula
Description: The most populous province, known for its agriculture, mining, and being a key transport hub.

Name: Cabo Delgado
Description: A northern province known for its beautiful coastline, rich natural resources, and oil fields.

Name: Niassa
Description: Located in the northwest, it is known for its lakes, national parks, and biodiversity.
